lexUnit.name: grin.n
lexUnit.definition: COD: a smile or grimace produced by grinning

sentence.text: Lexandro directed his grin at them .
Jane flashed a grin at Patrick and turned away to open the door .
And the wretch knew what she was thinking , Isabel realised , as fitzAlan threw a wicked grin at her under cover of the good-natured ribaldry from the other three .
A fine sweat was beading his forehead but there was a grin of triumph on his face .
The toothy grin of this naturally modest farmer 's son was less than villainous at the finish .
It was a grin of pure happiness .
A grin of unholy amusement slashed across his face .
The woman gave the knife to Fierce Eyes , who held it up , a grin of delight on his gaunt , ageing features .
His small round face crinkled up like a naughty baby and , through his irritation , Georg found himself having to stifle a grin of his own .
The grins on men 's faces grew broader .
I had a permanent grin on my face about it all .
Kersey watched him go , an appreciative grin on his face .
The grin on Turner 's face disappeared for a startled moment .
Chertro 's grin altered to a distasteful leer .
His grin flashed in the mirror .
Robbie taunted , and was infuriated by his complacent grin .
Now we know the secret behind that Cheshire Cat 's ecstatic grin !
Nina produced her terrifying crocodile grin .
A trace of Pickerage 's natural urchin grin wafted over his face .
Lorrimore said to me , and I answered ` Anywhere , sir , " in best Emil fashion , which drew a fast appreciative grin from Emil himself .
The girl smiled shyly up at the big man behind the wheel and got a friendly grin in return .
Tony scratched his head and a sour grin appeared on his handsome face .
Professor Ryker suppressed an admiring grin as she marched from the room .
One of the girls walked over to the time traveller and smiled a genuine welcoming grin .
A broad grin lit up Rory 's features .
He came to the kitchen , an unwilling , sheepish , pleased grin on his face .
Mr Purtill also posed for a picture with Mr Major , managing to rustle up a sheepish grin .
As I regained my composure I could see a wide grin on the Frenchman 's face .
Then a wide grin broke out across his face and he shook his head in amazement .
A wide grin of delight had become a permanent fixture on his face , and Paul smiled at him in return as he cantered back to check the ox carts .
Pion gave Masklin another encouraging grin .
I ai n't tried very much , " he said , giving her a shy grin .
The shopkeeper gave a large toothy grin .
Harry gave a self-deprecating grin .
Lindsey gave a wry grin .
He grinned his wide toothless grin at her and made his way unsteadily across the room to her side .
He grinned his vulpine grin at her , and she smiled dutifully at his self-mockery .
Janet had my breakfast laid out on the table and sat there grinning an insane grin at me .
Ludens looked his craziest , his hair jagged , his dark eyes narrowed , the corners of his mouth raised in a ghastly contorted grin of fear .
Kersey 's rubbery features creased in a ferocious grin .
His mouth twisted in a brief grin of self-mocking apology .
Her pretty perspiring face split into a sheepish grin , then became serious again on reflection of being taken over by her baser instincts so completely .
The old man answered my knock and his big face split into a delighted grin when he saw me .
His lips twisted into a mirthless grin .
Ruth did n't move , not a muscle other than the ones to widen her lips into a grin .
` I overheard you two talking , " Bernard replied with a sheepish grin .
` Blowing the gaff about a black marketeer in the family ? " suggested Iris with a mischievous grin .
The attendant explained with a friendly grin .
` Got your man yet ? " asked Garvie with a grin .
Take that grin off your face .
I was finding it hard to keep a grin off my face .
A cunning grin spread over Asshe 's face .
He broke off as Jim Miller let go a Indian whoop of relief and delighted grins spread across the faces of everyone in the group .
As though he knew very well what she was thinking , his grin widened , and he burst out laughing .
Jill Stewart 's grin widened .
